mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.zwfl zwfl, t.kkfl kkfl, t.flmj flmj, t.fljg fljg, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.fljg_eng fljgEng
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_ZW_FLXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name zwflmc, c4.code_name kkflmc FROM CFPA_ZW_FLXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zwfl = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CKLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.kkfl = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_FLXX(uuid,zwfl,kkfl,flmj,fljg,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,fljg_eng) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kkfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{flmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{fljg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{fljgEng,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_ZW_FLXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_FLXX(uuid,zwfl,kkfl,flmj,fljg,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.zwfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwfl,#{item.kkfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} kkfl,#{item.flmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} flmj,#{item.fljg,jdbcType=DOUBLE} fljg,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), zwfl = VALUES(zwfl), kkfl = VALUES(kkfl), flmj = VALUES(flmj), fljg = VALUES(fljg), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_ZW_FLXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
